name: Amazing Cargo Lorry Truck Driver - 3d Parking Game
name_original: Amazing Cargo Lorry Truck Driver - 3d Parking Game
description:
Get ready to play new truck parking game on the roads of city main highway. Adventure cargo simulation at its best. As an expert transporter driver, your duty is to drive the advance transport machinery vehicles and park your trailer onto the parking area. Ready for the real racing fever, here is the best game for you.

This is the ultimate solutions for those who want to learn driving on the streets of city urban area. Pick your best vehicle and challenge your friends for the most extreme stunt driving. Drive in hill, climb different mountains and rush through the traffic. The tracks are of different types ranging from hilly, grassy and on solid roads. You can choose from a range of realistic environments and take full adventure of drifting through other sports car.

Overtaking is a great fun especially when you are driving heavy vehicles like truck, trailer or any buss, because breaks are loose on sharp turns. Be a fast and furious driver. Don’t miss the chance to perform the duty of transporting cargo to the factory area. Stunning controls, pressure breaks, smooth steering controls and real turbo engine. Complete your cargo duty on every path don’t let the fellow drivers to rush above you. There are different lorry trucks on road also to let you drive and think for your journey. This is also an expensive luxury driving adventure for the beginners of trailer vehicles.

Buckle up the seatbelt and drive safely because you are about to drive long truck in the city area where there are civilians and other cars too. Play the best adventurous game in 2017 and prove your skills for the parking test. The delivery of cargo on time is also a big deal for you. Customers are really mad when you don’t deliver on time. You might have experienced other simulator games on trailer in year 2017. Think of driving fast but don’t crash in traffic. Police cars are also there so be careful. Show your thirst for speed and cross every hurdle that comes in your path.

Follow the symbols on road to reach your destination. This is not a construction trailer, so please be patient during driving. Play this latest 3d truck simulator game amongst the top simulation games. There are a range of many awesome trucks and trailers for fun. Be a unique cargo driver and deliver it on time. The epic experience on 3d truck simulation games is waiting for you. This real driving game will blow your mind.

You can select different driving modes and camera views for the best simulation of truck. A city environment and different hilly areas are waiting four your cargo. Drive and complete every mission to unlock different trucks of your choice. An ideal game for truck lovers with amazing features of oil tank. Burst the tyres and burn your wheels through drifting in the journey of amazing asphalt roads. Don’t do a massive destruction to your monster truck. Drive for miles in the highway and off-road areas.
